name: addExample
description: Adds an example with the specified label to a dataset.

data.description: Location of the local image file to upload.

labelId.description: ID of the label to add to the example.

name.description: Name of the example. Maximum length is 180 characters.

$ul: **createdAt**: Date and time that the example was created.
**label**: Contains information about the label with which the example is associated.
**datasetId**: ID of the dataset that the label belongs to.
**numExamples**: Number of examples that have the label.
**location**: URL of the image in the dataset. This is a temporary URL that expires in 30 minutes. This URL can be used to display images that were uploaded to a dataset in a UI.
**object**: Object returned; in this case, example.
